name: THE TECHNODROME
description:
Title:THE TECHNODROME

 Platform: browser based

 Genre: text-adventure

Rating: T

Target Market: Ages 13+,  casual gamers

Game Overview: Enter the TECHNODROME if you Dare! delve deep into the depths of the horrrific TECHNODROME in the text-based adventure. make choices  that could win you glory or end in your demise! Multiple Endings! Enjoy a nice read about your adventure and try to make the right decisuions to become the Champion of  the TECHNODROME!!!!!!!!!!!

 Instructions: Launch the Html file in your browser to delve into the TECHNODROME

 Design Team: Dillon Crawford Game Designer
